- miHoYo has updated the Russian localization for Genshin Impact in version 6.5, addressing previous translation issues and enhancing cultural relevance.
- The changes aim to improve player experience by making dialogues and character interactions more relatable to Russian audiences.
- The update reflects miHoYo's commitment to localization, acknowledging the importance of accurate and culturally sensitive translations in global gaming.
- Players can expect a more immersive experience as the adjustments align better with the nuances of the Russian language and culture.
- This move may strengthen the game's community in Russia, potentially increasing player engagement and satisfaction.
